warezcdn.name: Noumin Kanren no Skill Bakka Agetetara Naze ka Tsuyoku Natta.
warezcdn.title: Noumin Kanren no Skill bakka Agetetara Nazeka Tsuyoku Natta.

imdb.title: Noumin Kanren no Skill bakka Agetetara Nazeka Tsuyoku Natta.
imdb.plot: Al Wayne, a young man who aims to be a top-notch farmer, has refined his farming skills and finally reached the MAX level. However, once he achieved the pinnacle of farming skills, for some reason his life began to take a drastic ...

episodes.title: Top Notch Farmer
episodes.plot: Al Wayne is trying to live his peaceful farmer life, but a dragon and a demon horde is getting in his way, threatening his means of delivering his produce. He discovers abnormal effects of maxing out his farming levels. And a pesky princess is trying to recruit him for guard duty..

episodes.title: The Farmer and the Guild
episodes.plot: Al receives a plot of land as a reward for saving the kingdom. He enrolls in the adventures guild. On his first assignment for the guild, he encounters an ominous black dragon. His peaceful days as a farmer is slowly drifting away.

episodes.title: The Farmer and the Malevolent Dragon Ouroboros
episodes.plot: Learning the terrible secrets of the black Dragon, Al and the princess rush back to try to save Helen and the capitol.

episodes.title: The Farmer and the Life That Was Saved
episodes.plot: Al is saved by Mirage who reveals Helen is possessed by Ouroboros and so grants Al his purification magic to heal his injury.

episodes.title: The Farmer and Lurugus
episodes.plot: Ruri offers to escort Al to Lurugus. Reaching Lurugus, Ruri is saddened by their separation, so Al asks her to escort him home again in a week. Al visits his parents; his overly-doting mother Lucica and muscle-bound farmer father Gilles.

episodes.title: The Farmer and the Hero Who Can't Become a Hero
episodes.plot: The man who attacked Al and Ruri identifies as Loki, a demon who took an interest in Al after he defeated Romeo and Ouroboros. Loki is eliminating anyone who could stop the next Demon King; Ruri because she may one day be the hero, Al for his abilities and Helen who absorbed Ouroboros' power.

episodes.title: The Farmer and the Princess's Resolve
episodes.plot: Fal-Ys has a difficult conversation with her father. Al learns monster attacks have halted all inter-kingdom trading with many people now starving. The monsters are driven away by Prince Nedilus of Antisberg Kingdom, wielding the sacred sword Lævateinn. Fal-Ys abruptly informs Al she is leaving Meigis forever.

episodes.title: The Farmer and the Wedding
episodes.plot: Al, Helen and Ruri sneak into Antisberg intending to rescue Gazel's sweetheart so Gazel will be free.

episodes.title: Al's Past
episodes.plot: Fifteen years ago a young orphan named Ilvia was forced to steal crops to survive. Farmers caught her by surprise and decided to sold her to the slave traders but Al's parents paid for everything she stole and adopted Ilvia.

episodes.title: The Farmer and the Town of Ashparagus
episodes.plot: A girl named Linea requests an adventurer investigate something wrong with her town of Gal. Al volunteers, hoping to examine the Aspara vegetable grown in Gal.

episodes.title: The Farmer and the Reunion at the Demon King Castle
episodes.plot: When Al purchases herbicide to battle Bush-gillers, he saves a small girl from kidnappers. Reaks identifies her as Yuria, daughter and heir of the Demon King. She reveals her caretaker Volpe had suddenly told her she was in danger and teleported her away from her fathers castle; she wants Al to escort her home across the ocean.

episodes.title: The Farmer and the Renewed Resolve
episodes.plot: Ilvia reveals she was resurrected by the Evil God who granted her overwhelming power. Ilvia also reveals Al's Lover of Nature skill, which makes him so strong, was actually a gift from the Evil God, and that he has already met the Evil God. She then demands Al swear loyalty to her.
